Contact

Feel free to contact me anytime, my handle "kennedysgarage" for pretty much everything. Lately I have been bad at replying to emails and sometimes Twitter @ & DM. Don't take it personally, I hate love everyone equally. If you really want to get a hold of me or just say hi, add me on Google Talk or AIM.

 Birds of a feather flock together. Follow me on Twitter at @KennedysGarage.
